name: Osea
startIntroPart1: Vincent Harling, despite global crises, including the aftermath of Ulysses 1994XF04, you've maintained Oseaâ€™s neutrality during the Continental War! Your administration prioritized rebuilding and cooperating with Yuktobania, and championed the contruction of the International Space Elevator, a monumental project that connected Earth to Space! This achievement symbolized unity and progress to all nations of Strangereal. Now your people need your leadership once more, to skies unknown.
startIntroPart2: Vincent Harling, will your new empire shine through the ages of history?!
declaringWar: Our world stands at the precipice of conflict, and it is with a heavy heart that I make this proclamation.
attacked: Stop this senseless conflict, and come to the conference table to settle our differences.
defeated: May time shed light on the truth behind this conflict, and Razgriz avenge us.
introduction: The people of Osea welcome you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: To those who still dare to hide behind the power of their hateful weapons. Bring yourself before the light of peace and harmony.
tradeRequest: We hope you find this trade deal acceptable.
